name: ForceBall
description:
ForceBall is a local-multiplayer party game where you play as a sorcerer with the goal to eliminate your opponent. To do that you have to shoot a ForceBall and if this ball hits your opponent you win the round.

However its not as easy as it sounds, because you have to calculate your opponents move and you need to use your enviroment to calculate your shots.

How to Play: Just download the .zip file, extract it, get a friend and have fun.
